part_description: Features a screen, circular buttons, and a round top section. The screen is centrally located, with buttons arranged below it in a grid pattern. The round top section has a single circular indentation.
internal_interaction_description: The screen displays information controlled by the buttons. Each button corresponds to a specific function, sending signals to the internal circuitry to perform actions. The circular indentation may house a sensor or additional control feature.
external_interaction_description: The remote interacts with electronic devices by sending signals when buttons are pressed. It requires a line of sight to the device it controls, typically using infrared or Bluetooth technology. Users hold it in hand, aiming it towards the target device.
